text: niṅṅaḷkkippēāḷ kēṭupāṭukaḷ paṟṟiyiṭṭuṇṭeṅkil (mump‌) akkūṭṭarkkuṁ atupēāle kēṭupāṭukaḷ paṟṟiyiṭṭuṇṭ‌. ā (yud'dha) divasaṅṅaḷile jayāpajayaṅṅaḷ āḷukaḷkkiṭayil nāṁ māṟṟikkeāṇṭirikkunnatāṇ‌. viśvasiccavare allāhu tiriccaṟiyuvānuṁ, niṅṅaḷil ninn raktasākṣikaḷe uṇṭākkittīrkkuvānuṁ kūṭiyāṇat‌. allāhu akramikaḷe iṣṭappeṭukayilla
